enhanced_by.reason: The words method relies on the word method to generate individual words, making it a direct dependency for setting up the test.
Both methods involve generating text content, which suggests similar state initialization requirements.
The sentence method generates sentences composed of words, similar to the words method, making it useful for constructing assertions about word generation.
The paragraph method generates paragraphs composed of sentences, which in turn are composed of words, making it useful for broader assertions about word generation.
